verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> collection <S%G3048><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> I have given order <S%G1299><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> of Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> ye. <S%G5210><s%>

Upon the first <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3391><s%> day of the week <S%G4521><s%> let every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G1438><s%> in store, <S%G2343><s%> as <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> God hath prospered <S%G2137><s%> him, that <S%G2443><s%> there be <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> gatherings <S%G3048><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I come, <S%G3854><s%> whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> ye shall approve <S%G1381><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> your letters, <S%G1992><s%> them <S%G5128><s%> will I send <S%G3992><s%> to bring <S%G667><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> liberality <S%G5485><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> it be <S%G5600><s%> meet <S%G514><s%> that I go also, <S%G2504><s%> <S%G4198><s%> they shall go <S%G4198><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I shall pass through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia: <S%G3109><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I do pass through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it may be <S%G5177><s%> that I will abide, <S%G3887><s%> yea, <S%G2228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> winter <S%G3914><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> may bring me on my journey <S%G4311><s%> <S%G3165><s%> whithersoever <S%G3757><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I go. <S%G4198><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> now <S%G737><s%> by the way; <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3938><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> to tarry <S%G1961><s%> a while <S%G5100><s%> <S%G5550><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> permit. <S%G2010><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> I will tarry <S%G1961><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> Pentecost. <S%G4005><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> door <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> effectual <S%G1756><s%> is opened <S%G455><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there are many <S%G4183><s%> adversaries. <S%G480><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> see <S%G991><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may be <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> without fear: <S%G870><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he worketh <S%G2038><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> do.

Let no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> despise <S%G1848><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> conduct him forth <S%G4311><s%> <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I look for <S%G1551><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren. <S%G80><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> As touching <S%G4012><s%> our brother <S%G80><s%> Apollos, <S%G625><s%> I greatly <S%G4183><s%> desired <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren: <S%G80><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> his will <S%G2307><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> not at all <S%G3843><s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> at this time; <S%G3568><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he will come <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he shall have convenient time. <S%G2119><s%>
Watch <S%G1127><s%> ye, stand fast <S%G4739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> quit you like men, <S%G407><s%> be strong. <S%G2901><s%>
Let all your things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5216><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> charity. <S%G26><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> ye (know <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of Stephanas, <S%G4734><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the firstfruits <S%G536><s%> of Achaia, <S%G882><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that they have addicted <S%G5021><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> saints,) <S%G40><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> submit yourselves unto <S%G5293><s%> such, <S%G5108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to every one <S%G3956><s%> that helpeth with <S%G4903><s%> us, and <S%G2532><s%> laboreth. <S%G2872><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> I am glad <S%G5463><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> coming <S%G3952><s%> of Stephanas <S%G4734><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Fortunatus <S%G5415><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Achaicus: <S%G883><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> that which was lacking <S%G5303><s%> on your part <S%G5216><s%> they <S%G3778><s%> have supplied. <S%G378><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they have refreshed <S%G373><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yours: <S%G5216><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> acknowledge <S%G1921><s%> ye them that are such. <S%G5108><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> of Asia <S%G773><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Priscilla <S%G4252><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> that is in <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G848><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> ye one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> salutation <S%G783><s%> of me Paul <S%G3972><s%> with mine own <S%G1699><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>

If any man <S%G1536><s%> love <S%G5368><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> let him be <S%G2277><s%> Anathema <S%G331><s%> Maranatha. <S%G3134><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>
